CheckoutAdditionalInformationForm.additionalInformationInstructions: Please provide additional information for the following items in your order.

CheckoutCompleted.orderCompletedSuccessfully: Your order has been completed successfully!
CheckoutCompleted.orderPartiallyCompleted: Your order has been partially completed!
CheckoutCompleted.orderMarkedRefunded: Your order has been marked as refunded!

CheckoutCompletedDeliverables.moreItemsDownload: and {count} more items which you can access by downloading {label}.
CheckoutCompletedDeliverables.outOfStockMessage: This product is currently out of stock. Please contact our Support for more information.
CheckoutCompletedDeliverables.productDeliveryFailed: This product could not be delivered. Please contact our Support for more information.

CheckoutCompletedFeedback.feedbackIneligibleManual: This order is not eligible for a feedback (Manually Processed)
CheckoutCompletedFeedback.feedbackIneligibleAmount: This order is not eligible for a feedback (Insignificant Amount)
CheckoutCompletedFeedback.feedbackCouponIncentive: Leave a feedback to get a discount coupon for your next purchase. Minimum rating required: {rating} stars.
CheckoutCompletedFeedback.feedbackEmailInstructions: You can leave feedback by clicking the "Leave Feedback" button in the e-mail you received upon order completion.
CheckoutCompletedFeedback.automaticFeedbackWarning: If you do not leave feedback within 7 days, a 5-star feedback will be automatically left for you.

CheckoutCompletedRedirectUrl.clickContinueOrder: Click anywhere to continue to your order.

CheckoutDiscordIntegration.connectDiscordRequired: Connect your Discord account to continue.
CheckoutDiscordIntegration.discordDescriptionWithRole: to automatically join our Discord server and receive a role.
CheckoutDiscordIntegration.discordDescriptionWithoutRole: to automatically join our Discord server.

CheckoutFailed.paymentNotSentInTime: The payment was not sent in time.
CheckoutFailed.orderProcessingFailed: This order could not be processed. If you think this is a mistake, please contact our support or try again later.

CheckoutOrderInformationForm.emailPlaceholder: The order confirmation will be sent to this e-mail address.
CheckoutOrderInformationForm.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid e-mail address
CheckoutOrderInformationForm.couponPlaceholder: Have a coupon code? Enter it here.
CheckoutOrderInformationForm.termsRequired: Please accept the terms and conditions
CheckoutOrderInformationForm.termsAgreement: I have read and agree to {shopName}'s Terms of Service.
CheckoutOrderInformationForm.newsletterSignup: I would like to receive updates and promotions from {shopName}.

CheckoutPayCashApp.addNoteWarning: Make sure to Add The Note, otherwise your order won't be automatically processed.
CheckoutPayCashApp.addNoteInstruction: Add a note to the payment, otherwise it will be ignored.
CheckoutPayCashApp.automaticProcessingMessage: Your order will be automatically processed once the payment is received.
CheckoutPayCashApp.sendPaymentWithNote: You should send a payment with a note to the following account.
CheckoutPayCashApp.sendExactAmount: Make sure to send the exact amount.
CheckoutPayCashApp.scanQrCode: You can scan the QR code.
CheckoutPayCashApp.manualAcceptanceWait: Please wait while your payment is manually accepted by the account owner.
CheckoutPayCashApp.confirmationMessage: You will receive a confirmation once the payment is processed.
CheckoutPayCashApp.contactForAssistance: If you have any questions or need further assistance, please contact us.

CheckoutPayCryptocurrency.sendPaymentToAddress: You should send a payment to the following address.
CheckoutPayCryptocurrency.sendExactAmount: Make sure to send the exact amount.
CheckoutPayCryptocurrency.sendExactRemainingAmount: Make sure to send the exact remaining amount.
CheckoutPayCryptocurrency.scanQrCode: You can scan the QR code.
CheckoutPayCryptocurrency.automaticProcessingRemaining: Your order will be automatically processed once the remaining amount is received.
CheckoutPayCryptocurrency.automaticProcessingPayment: Your order will be automatically processed once the payment is received.
CheckoutPayCryptocurrency.automaticProcessingConfirmation: Your order will be automatically processed once the transaction is confirmed.

CheckoutPayExternalUrl.paymentPageOpened: The payment page has been opened in a new tab

CheckoutPayManual.markedAsPaidSuccess: Invoice marked as paid successfully! Please wait for confirmation.
CheckoutPayManual.markedAsPaidFailed: Failed to mark invoice as paid. Please try again.

CheckoutPayPayPalFriendsFamily.warningFriendsFamilyNote: Warning - Friends & Family Payment with Note

CheckoutPayPayPalFriendsFamily.copyEmailBelow: Copy the PayPal e-mail address below.

CheckoutPayPayPalFriendsFamily.noNoteInstruction: Do not include a note when sending the payment.

CheckoutPayRevolutBusiness.clickTheButtonBelowToPayForYourOrder: Click the button below to pay for your order.

CheckoutPaySumUp.sumupPaymentProcessing: Your SumUp payment is being processed...
CheckoutPaySumUp.paymentFailedRetry: Payment failed. Please refresh and try again or use a different card.

CheckoutPaySumUp.paymentCancelled: Payment was cancelled. Please try again.
CheckoutPaySumUp.paymentErrorGeneric: An error occurred processing your payment. Please try again.
CheckoutPaySumUp.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
CheckoutPaySumUp.authenticationFailed: Card authentication failed. Please try a different card.
CheckoutPaySumUp.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds. Please try a different card.

CheckoutRefunded.orderRefundedMessage: This order has been marked as refunded.

CheckoutShopCustomerBalanceButton.otpSent: OTP has been sent to your e-mail.
CheckoutShopCustomerBalanceButton.otpSentInstructions: An one time password has been sent to your e-mail address. Please enter it below to access your account and pay with your balance.
CheckoutShopCustomerBalanceButton.otpCaptchaInstructions: A one time password will be sent to your e-mail address after the CAPTCHA verification. Please wait a moment.
CheckoutShopCustomerBalanceButton.logInCustomerAccount: Log in to Your Customer Account
CheckoutShopCustomerBalanceButton.insufficientBalance: You do not have enough balance to pay for this invoice.
CheckoutShopCustomerBalanceButton.sufficientBalance: You have enough balance to pay for this invoice.

CheckoutTicketButton.openTicketInstructions: You can Open a Ticket on your Customer Dashboard to receive assistance from our support team.
